entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 3.2 km

Dewpoint: -4.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers this afternoon and ending later this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
